name: neeo-adapter
description: Adapter for the WebThings Gateway to control NEEO devices. This adapter uses actions to dispatch HTTP triggers to NEEO macros.
author: Michael Kohler <me@michaelkohler.info>

scripts.build: shasum --algorithm 256 manifest.json package.json *.js LICENSE README.md > SHA256SUMS && find node_modules \( -type f -o -type l \) -exec shasum --algorithm 256 {} \; >> SHA256SUMS
